Text: thanks, but whoever ripped the movie had no idea how to rip...the AR is way too large and they didnt crop off the black bar at the top ...ridiculous!

While I'm sure metalcore is correct, I have purchased copies of the Finnish DVD from 2 different sources, both of which replaced unplayable DVDs at my request, and I have never gotten discs that did not hang up in the last 2 episodes on each disc. The files on this torrent may not be perfect, but it seems that everything that I burn myself plays on my DVD player so it is a damn sight better than the commercial alternatives. Thank you, from the bottom of my heart.
